data.title: Company News Archives
data.text:
Digital Demand Takes Off!

Here’s Our New Digital Press

Want to learn more about how this technology can help you? Call us today!

Rose City Label has recently added more cutting edge digital printing capability. Our full color digital, dry toner printing provides crisp detail on both coated and uncoated label stocks. The press set up is very fast and efficient, which is good for the environment and cost effective for the customer.

The quality is outstanding. Once the roll is printed, it is moved to a second machine for cutting. This all digital process doesn’t use ink, actual cutting dyes, or plates. The image is cut from a digital file that we create from your artwork. No more charges for special shapes or sizes.

Any size, any shape, we can do it all. On this machine the label is laminated with a protective film die cut, and waste is removed to leave the finished label complete and ready to ship. This is the digital advantage and this is the future of short run, full color label printing.

For more information, call us today.

It’s Rose Festival Wine Time Again!

Rose City Label is again pleased to partner with Oak Knoll Winery to produce the commemorative Rose Festival Wine. Here RCL Art Director, Lisa Helfrich, shows the winning artist around our shop. Sarah was excited to learn about how her design would become a reality on the label of an exceptional wine. Look for this wine to be released soon.

Sarah Fagan is a Portland educator, painter, and printmaker originally from New England. As a painter, she focuses on still lifes, especially those featuring objects of nostalgia and celebration. Sarah recently completed a post baccalaureate program at the Oregon College of Art and Craft with a concentration in Book Arts.

Oak Knoll Winery ~ Celebrating our 41st Anniversary this year, the second generation is proud to continue the tradition of partnership and support of the Portland Rose Festival as the founders have done for several years. Oak Knoll is truly an Oregon Wine Pioneer. Learn more about the winery at www.oakknollwinery.com

Portland Rose Festival ~ The Official Festival of the City of Portland is honored to have brought over 100 years of amazing events to Oregon. From our beginnings in 1907 through today, the Rose Festival has represented the Rose Spirit of Portland through the Grand Floral Parade, the Rose Festival Court and many other iconic celebrations. Explore the history and the future of the Rose Festival at www.rosefestival.org

Great Customers with Great Products!

This Canby, Oregon chocolate producer and wine bar reflects all the tenacity and hard work of its owner, Teresa Sasse. Over the past few years, this business has grown both as a fun wine shop and a great chocolate producer. The quality ingredients and attention to detail can only be fully appreciated by tasting the chocolate. You’ll be happy you did!

When they need help with new label designs to match their high quality image, Puddin’ River turned to Rose City Label. As the products and packaging have evolved, and new items have been added, Puddin’ River has always been very satisfied with the quality, pricing, and responsive service we have provided.

Find out more about their products, and make a point to visit their wonderful shop. Click here to visit their website for all the information.

Call us today to see how we can help you!

Build your brand with Distinctive Labels

This innovative wine label jumps off the shelf with it’s distinctive sparkle hot foil treatment. This unique foil and custom die shape have set made this label recognizable to wine lovers for many years – making your product stand out is what the label is all about!

Do you want your label to represent your brand? Do you want it to become an icon, recognized by your customers and competitors? It should tell the story of your product and compel your customers to recommend it to their friends. Ask us how we can help with this.

If you want to try this great wine, click here to visit their website. They are located at 4510 SE 23rd, Portland OR 97202. Call them at 503-234-3790. They have a fun group of wine lovers ready to help you.

Happy Holiday time at Rose City Label

Although we work very hard to make sure your labels are printed perfectly, on time, every time, we also like to have FUN! With an average tenure of 12 years, our team really is more like a family. This year we celebrated the Holiday with our whole work family, including a visit from a few retired employees! Even after they leave the business, we still try to keep a connection with these people that we worked with for so many years – here are some photos of the fun.

We would love to put our family to work printing great labels for YOU!

Call us today!

More Digital Printing at Rose City Label!

Faster turn around times

Lower set up costs – No plates and dies

Better pricing on short run full color labels

We are thrilled to bring in more high quality, cutting edge printing equipment to meet your needs in 2011 and beyond. Ask us if this new technology is right for your next label project.

Call us today!
